jgame.controller

Class EntranceExitController

  • java.lang.Object
    • jgame.controller.AbstractIntensityController
      • jgame.controller.EntranceExitController
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Controller

    public class EntranceExitController
extends AbstractIntensityController
    A controller that changes an object's alpha at a constant rate.
    Author:
    William Chargin
